solution_line_template: He saved money for {years_saving} years, which is equal to {months_per_year} x {years_saving} = <<{months_per_year}*{years_saving}={total_months}>>{total_months} months.
The amount of money he saved is ${monthly_saving}*{total_months} = $<<{monthly_saving}*{total_months}={total_saved}>>{total_saved}.
But he spent some money so there is ${total_saved} - ${amount_spent} = <<{total_saved}-{amount_spent}={remaining}>>{remaining} left.
